title: Jack Abramoff Joins Preston Gates - Launches Tribal Lobbying Practice
summary: Jack Abramoff joins the Seattle-based lobbying firm Preston Gates & Ellis, where he would develop a lucrative but fraudulent tribal casino lobbying practice. The Mississippi Band of Choctaw Indians would become his first major tribal client after Republican electoral victories in 1994 eliminated many of their traditional Congressional allies.

sources.title: How scheming lobbyist operated in Seattle firm
